name: Sentry.io
natural_language_description: 这是 Sentry.io 节点。主要用于: Consume Sentry.io API

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: accessToken

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: event

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new team
Get (值: get) - Get team by slug
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many teams

organizationSlug.name: organizationSlug
organizationSlug.description: The slug of the organization the team belongs to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
organizationSlug.natural_language_description: 参数名: Organization Slug Name or ID | 作用: The slug of the organization the team belongs to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

projectSlug.name: projectSlug
projectSlug.description: The slug of the project to delete. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
projectSlug.natural_language_description: 参数名: Project Slug Name or ID | 作用: The slug of the project to delete. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

full.name: full
full.description: Whether the event payload will include the full event body, including the stack trace
full.natural_language_description: 参数名: Full | 作用: Whether the event payload will include the full event body, including the stack trace | 默认值: True

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

eventId.name: eventId
eventId.description: The ID of the event to retrieve (either the numeric primary-key or the hexadecimal ID as reported by the raven client)
eventId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event ID | 作用: The ID of the event to retrieve (either the numeric primary-key or the hexadecimal ID as reported by the raven client) | (必填项)

issueId.name: issueId
issueId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Issue ID | 作用: ID of issue to get | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: slug (值: None) - The optional slug for this team. If not provided it will be auto generated from the name.

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: The name of the team | (必填项)

agreeTerms.name: agreeTerms
agreeTerms.description: Whether you agree to the applicable terms of service and privacy policy of Sentry.io
agreeTerms.natural_language_description: 参数名: Agree to Terms | 作用: Whether you agree to the applicable terms of service and privacy policy of Sentry.io | 默认值: False

organization_slug.name: organization_slug
organization_slug.description: The slug of the organization to update. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
organization_slug.natural_language_description: 参数名: Slug Name or ID | 作用: The slug of the organization to update. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: name (值: None) - The new name of the team
slug (值: None) - The new slug of the team. Must be unique and available.

teamSlug.name: teamSlug
teamSlug.description: The slug of the team to delete. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
teamSlug.natural_language_description: 参数名: Team Slug Name or ID | 作用: The slug of the team to delete. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

version.name: version
version.description: A version identifier for this release. Can be a version number, a commit hash etc.
version.natural_language_description: 参数名: Version | 作用: A version identifier for this release. Can be a version number, a commit hash etc. | (必填项)

url.name: url
url.description: A URL that points to the release. This can be the path to an online interface to the sourcecode for instance.
url.natural_language_description: 参数名: URL | 作用: A URL that points to the release. This can be the path to an online interface to the sourcecode for instance. | (必填项)

projects.name: projects
projects.description: A list of project slugs that are involved in this release. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
projects.natural_language_description: 参数名: Project Names or IDs | 作用: A list of project slugs that are involved in this release. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)
